name: Super Salon
description:
Feel the excitement of running your own beauty salon! Customers need your help looking good and it's up to you to transform them by plucking their eyebrows or putting on their makeup. Is that a black head: we’re going to have to pop them right off! Is that a unibrow? We can’t have people leaving our salon looking like that! It is up to you to make people feel their best!

Keep customers satisfied and earn enough to upgrade your place of business. Run the best shop in town and keep the clients coming back. Treat their eyes, face, nose, and hair to have their dream makeovers come true!

Are you a good enough stylist?



Game Features:
1. Simple but addicting mechanics
Clients will come in needing some help. Whether its their eyes, there nose, or their face just tap or swipe to modify their appearance

2. Beautiful Graphics
Have fun watching the transformation happen. Bright colors and unique animation will keep you hooked

3. Keep on upgrading!
Make that shop your own. Keep customers happy and earn enough to transform the salon into a beautiful new place that is yours.

4. Relax and enjoy
No need to worry what people look like. Just tap, swipe and enjoy being a stylist.


These people need a stylist! Will you help them out?
